CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Cultural Endowment relative to Aethelgard Cultural Council?
SRP.A: Zenith Cultural Endowment is {below} Aethelgard Cultural Council in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Borealis Artistic Grants relative to Aethelgard Cultural Council?
SRP.A: Borealis Artistic Grants is {below} Aethelgard Cultural Council in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Stellar Cultural Development Agency relative to Silverhaven Arts Foundation?
SRP.A: Stellar Cultural Development Agency is {below} Silverhaven Arts Foundation in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cultural event funding?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Zenith Cultural Endowment}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cultural event funding?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Borealis Artistic Grants}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Zenith Cultural Endowment's maximum Cultural Event Funding in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Zenith Cultural Endowment's maximum Cultural Event Funding is in {1990}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Stellar Cultural Development Agency's minimum Cultural Event Funding in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Stellar Cultural Development Agency's minimum Cultural Event Funding is in {2008}.

NC.Q: Was the total Cultural Event Funding in 1991 higher or lower than in 2000?
NC.A: The total cultural event funding in 1991 was {higher} than in 2000.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2008, was the average total Cultural Event Funding higher or lower than between 1992 and 2004?
NC.A: The average total cultural event funding between 2006 and 2008 was {higher} than between 1992 and 2004.

NC.Q: Between 2007 and 2008, did the total Cultural Event Funding experience a larger or smaller change than between 1990 and 2003?
NC.A: The change in total cultural event funding between 2007 and 2008 was {smaller} than between 1990 and 2003.

NC.Q: Was the total Cultural Event Funding in 2001 higher or lower than in 2008?
NC.A: The total cultural event funding in 2001 was {lower} than in 2008.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Silverhaven Arts Foundation} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aethelgard Cultural Council and Borealis Artistic Grants first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aethelgard Cultural Council and Borealis Artistic Grants first exchanged leading positions in {1990}.
